scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.type-check: cd client && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../server && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd client && npm run lint -- --fix && cd ../server && npm run lint -- --fix
scripts.audit: npm audit && cd client && npm audit && cd ../server && npm audit
scripts.check-all: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test:e2e
